ablanor 2.1.0

CHA2DS2VASc

Source: R/utlede_variabler.R
utlede_CHA2DS2VASc.Rd

Add variable CHA2DS2VASc score from 0 to 9. #'

utlede_CHA2DS2VASc(df)

Arguments

df

data.frame with Ablanor-data. Must contain variables hjertesvikt, hypertoni and diabetes, tia_slag, alder and gender.

Value

Returns df with 1 new column

Details

  • hjertesvikt: score +1

  • hypertoni: score +1

  • karsykdom: score +1

  • diabetes: score +1

  • tia_slag: score +2

  • gender(kvinne:) score +1

  • alder(>=65; <75): score +1

  • alder(>=75): score +2

Examples

  df <- data.frame(
    hjertesvikt = c(NA, 2, rep(1, 8)),
    hypertoni = c(NA, 1, NA, 0, 0, 9, 9, 1, 1, 1),
    karsykdom = c(0, 1, 1, 1, 1, 0, 0, NA, NA, 9),
    diabetes = c(NA, 9, 1, 9, 1, 1, NA, 1, 0, 9),
    tia_slag = c(NA, 1, 1, 9, 1, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0),
    alder = c(18, 25, 64, 65, 70, 74, 75, 76, 80, 105),
    gender = c(rep(1, 4), NA, NA, rep(2, 4)))

 ablanor::utlede_CHA2DS2VASc(df)
#>    hjertesvikt hypertoni karsykdom diabetes tia_slag alder gender CHA2DS2VASc
#> 1           NA        NA         0       NA       NA    18      1           0
#> 2            2         1         1        9        1    25      1           4
#> 3            1        NA         1        1        1    64      1           5
#> 4            1         0         1        9        9    65      1           3
#> 5            1         0         1        1        1    70     NA           6
#> 6            1         9         0        1        1    74     NA           5
#> 7            1         9         0       NA        0    75      2           4
#> 8            1         1        NA        1        1    76      2           8
#> 9            1         1        NA        0        0    80      2           5
#> 10           1         1         9        9        0   105      2           5
